Text: Beyond Time's Shore

The World Government Association of Art has restored a Golden Age film called "Froggie's Day." The Gray Raven Commandant and Lucia arranged to go watch the movie together, but what they didn't expect was that a wonderful surprise was quietly waiting for them ahead...
